alert.note: Alert for West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 2:08AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. * WHERE...Marias Pass, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, Polebridge, Bad Rock Canyon, and Essex. * WHEN...From 5 AM early this morning to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing and drifting snow expected in Badrock Canyon along US Highway 2 Wednesday night into Thursday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
